## Biography

I'm a PhD Candidate in Computer Science at the School of Digital Science, Universiti Brunei Darussalam. A passionate researcher with strong foundations in **AI**, **deep learning** and **computer vision**. I have experience working with CNNs, Vision Transformers (ViT), and explainability tools like SHAP and Grad-CAM.

Life is the greatest learning platform and I believe that teaching is alternative way of learning.

---

## Research Interests

- Deep Learning for Computer Vision (Natural & Medical Imaging)
- Multi-task Learning
- Explainable AI (Attention Mechanism, SHAP, Grad-CAM)
- Regression model for medical imaging domain
- Data Analytics
